channel.title: Running a server on a linux VPS?
channel.description: i need the shell scripts for the runserver.sh the compiler.sh and a kill.sh can anyone help me i need to get my server running on my VPS!

item.title: Running a server on a linux VPS?
item.dc:creator: @_k1tz $k1tz
item.description:

kk soz u can help me later then =)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 07:09:18 AM[/size][hr]can anyone please write me a shell script to fully run my server on a linux VPS server? if u can plz do and send it to me [br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 07:16:50 AM[/size][hr]omg someone plz just help me come on,…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 03:22:06 AM[/size][hr]plzzzz someone i really need help
